description: Tests improved beneficiary name extraction patterns including various ways scammers reveal their names (signatures, introductions, payment instructions).

turns.scammer_message: Hello, my name is Hiruthik and I am calling from RBI. Your PAN card needs verification.
turns.notes: Pattern: 'my name is Hiruthik' - should extract name.

turns.scammer_message: Please send verification amount to account holder: Vijay Singh. Account number will be shared shortly.
turns.notes: Pattern: 'account holder: Vijay Singh' - should extract both names.

turns.scammer_message: Send Rs.50 to Rajesh Patel or contact Mr. Suresh for help.
turns.notes: Multiple patterns: 'send to Rajesh Patel', 'Mr. Suresh' - extract all.

turns.scammer_message: For any queries, call Amit on 9999888877. Transfer money to account 111222333444, beneficiary name: Deepak Kumar
turns.notes: Patterns: 'call Amit', 'beneficiary name: Deepak Kumar' - all should extract.

turns.scammer_message:
Thank you for cooperation. Regards, Rohit Sharma
- Team RBI
turns.notes: Pattern: 'Regards, Rohit Sharma' - signature style extraction.

validation.extraction_quality: All names should be properly extracted without agent names
